title: Two Quarrelsome Childhood Friends Locked In A Room They Can’t Get Out Of Unless They’re Honest With Each Other, And After They Get Out Of The Room, They Start Dating. - Novel Updates
author: Gennou Tomohiro   Konpeito (金平糖)   言納智大   金平糖
description: A story of two quarrelsome childhood friends who are locked in a room they can't get out of unless they're honest with each other, and after they get out of the room, they start dating.>
